Text: hello i think  you have the best uploads but could u please make the 720p series in mp4 instead of mkv files ps3 cant play mkv but mp4 is the best quality ?

If you can't play mkv, it's YOUR problem! 

Search on internet for mkv add-ins like "K-Lite Codec Pack" for Windows mediaplayer.

cuntsauce: You should watch your behaviour and mostly read what you are yelling about in the first place! He was talking about PS3 not PC. That console is NOT able to play .mkv files and your lack of knowledge demonstrates a lack of your ... well, fill the rest yourself.

NickChronic: .mkv is standard file format for high-def video streams used widely on the net. However, you can convert .mkv into .vob and this file is ps3 able to play - follow f.e. this guide: http://hubpages.com/hub/How-To-Play-MKV-Files-On-Playstation-3

sheesh, it's the ps3 that can't play it, not the pc.

google "mkv2vob"+"ps3", it's a tool that will make ps3 compatible files from (any?) mkv.

remember, mkv is just a container, the video itself might be encoded in many different formats (like mp4).
